data.name: Killer
data.detailed_description:
Kill them all (KILL).

Play as an unnamed, unidentified person and create an absolute powerhouse out of them. Gain points by murdering others, try to beat others on the leader board (THEY ARE INFERIOR).
Use your points (BLOOD OF THE ENEMIES) to upgrade your symptoms and skills to aid you in gaining more points.
Beware, certain symptoms will make it majorly harder for you to function (YOU'RE USELESS) while increasing terror presence.

Featuring 3 maps at launch and 10 weapons, the game will have 30+ perks to adjust your character and help you achieve a higher score.

Perks:
Perks will help gain points but typically at a loss of certain things, these can range from distorting your vision to 'hallucinating', but multiply the score earned by small amounts.

Maps:
The launch maps will consist of City, Suburbs and Metro.

Weapons:
Varying blades, guns and homemade weapons between.

Kill, Gain Upgrade, Repeat, Win.

data.short_description: Kill them all (KILL). Kill figures to gain points, upgrade your character with perks and debuffs, repeat the process of killing gaining and upgrading, win by achieving the highest score. Kill, Gain Upgrade, Repeat, Win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any i think should work? Just dont use dos
  • Processor: Microwave processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: At least the same that a CAS calculator uses
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run on a toaster guaranteed on low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-8750h
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Can run on basically anything

content_descriptors.notes: It has violence and low poly gore (just a smidge).
